root.name: Capcom Digital Collection
root.description: Overview:A disc based product that includes 8 downloadable Capcom titles. The game's menu acts as a proxy which loads up each game separately and treats them as if they were their XBLA originals. This means the disc is treated as 6 different games by Xbox Live with 6 different sets of achievements.Included Games1942: Joint StrikeBionic Commando Rearmed 2Final Fight: Double ImpactFLOCK!Rocketmen: Axis of Evil including Rocketmen: It Came From Uranus expansionSuper Puzzle Fighter II Turbo HD RemixSuper Street Fighter II Turbo HD RemixWolf of the Battlefield: Commando 3
